English

category, a documentary film
Production: France, 2005

"Ushuaia, a face of the earth" is more natural than the program. It is a journey through the most beautiful places in the world with the most popular French adventurer - Nicolas Hulot.
The creators believe that a miracle seen with my own eyes is the first step to begin to respect the natural environment. In this series, its beauty is confirmed by the fabulous pictures. Will visit the four corners of the world and discover the unique places and phenomena. The creators were at the equator, the highest mountains in the world, the Himalayas, where at an altitude of 13,000 feet, people live as if time has stopped centuries ago, in the frigid waters of the Arctic Circle, and yet undiscovered jungles of New Guinea. We'll see volcanoes in Kamchatka, Lake Baikal, Siberia called the eye, full one thousand mysterious and breathtaking plants and animals and feel the spirit of the Mongolian nomads land.

A series of documentary is a hymn to the many beautiful places on Earth, of which there do not realize, and that we should protect, before it's too late.
